sentences.en: As women we generally say and feel too much about these things.
sentences.cn: 作为女性，我们通常在这些事情上谈得过多，过于敏锐。

sentences.en: Caviar and oysters on ice are generally considered the ultimate luxury foods.
sentences.cn: 一般认为，鱼子酱和冰镇牡蛎是顶级美味。

sentences.en: Equations are generally written with a two-bar equals sign.
sentences.cn: 等式通常用两道横的等号来表示。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the more expensive the stereo, the better it is.
sentences.cn: 一般说来，立体声音响越贵的越好。

sentences.en: Generally, the lower classes are considered to be the bearers of tradition.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，下层民众被认为是传统的保持者。

sentences.en: Generally, warm colours advance in painting and cold colours recede.
sentences.cn: 通常，绘画中暖色调为近感色，而冷色调为远感色。

sentences.en: Girls generally reach sexual maturity two years earlier than boys.
sentences.cn: 通常女孩性发育成熟要比男孩早两年。

sentences.en: Goods are generally shipped by airmail.
sentences.cn: 货物一般通过航空运输。

sentences.en: He managed to lighten the generally lifeless debate at times.
sentences.cn: 他让这场总体很沉闷的辩论时不时迸出了些火花。

sentences.en: He was generally disliked and regarded as a pompous ass.
sentences.cn: 他常不招人待见，而且被看作是个自负的大傻帽儿。

sentences.en: He was generally feeling bad. He just couldn'tshake it off.
sentences.cn: 他整个人感觉不太舒服，总是好不了。

sentences.en: It could be five years before the drug is generally available.
sentences.cn: 这种药可能还要过五年才能广泛投入市场。

sentences.en: Men are generally better able to express anger.
sentences.cn: 男人通常能更好地表达愤怒。
波兰工业普遍陷于停滞。

sentences.en: She had few friends, and was generally not very happy.
sentences.cn: 她几乎没什么朋友，总的来说不怎么开心。

sentences.en: Speaking generally, the space enterprise has served astronomy well.
sentences.cn: 总的说来，航空企业很好地促进了天文学的发展。

sentences.en: University teachers generally have admitted a lack of enthusiasm about their subjects.
sentences.cn: 高校教师大体上承认对其所教专业缺乏热情。

words.tran_cn: 一般的，普通的；综合的；大体的
广义的，普遍的；无显著特点的
类的；一般的；属的；非商标的
（英）一般化；归纳；普遍原理（等于generalization）
（有多方面知识和经验的）通才；多面手
推广（generalize的过去分词）；对…进行概括；使…一般化
推广；笼统地讲；概括（等于generalize）

trans.tran_en: used to introduce a statement that is true in most cases but not always
